articles.title: American Airlines cancels more than 700 flights, citing weather and staffing issues - CNBC
articles.description: American Airlines cancelled more than 700 flights this weekend and said weather disruptions were sparked by staffing constraints.
articles.content:
American Airlines has canceled more than 1,000 flights since Friday, disruptions it blamed on staffing problems and high winds at its busiest hub.
On Saturday, American canceled nearly 460 flights, … [+2133 chars]
